title: Authors and Citation
text: Feldhege J (2025). openholidaysR: Provides Access OpenHolidays API. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/jfeldhege/openholidaysR.
code: @Manual{,   title = {openholidaysR: Provides Access to the OpenHolidays API},   author = {Johannes Feldhege},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/jfeldhege/openholidaysR}, }

what: Provides Access to the OpenHolidays API
title: Provides Access to the OpenHolidays API
text: goal openholidaysR provide dates public school holidays number countries subdivisions OpenHolidays API https://openholidaysapi.org/.

title: Provides Access to the OpenHolidays API
text: can install development version openholidaysR GitHub :

title: Provides Access to the OpenHolidays API
text: basic example shows get public holidays Germany January 2025:
code: library(openholidaysR)  oh_public_holidays(country = "DE",                    language = "DE",                    start_date = "2025-01-01",                    end_date = "2025-01-31") #>                                     id  startDate    endDate   type #> 1 27f0d8cd-76b2-47e7-89ac-a3a9f6a6b1ba 2025-01-01 2025-01-01 Public #> 2 1c80b87d-8221-4dc2-9a1a-3b0f57dce9f5 2025-01-06 2025-01-06 Public #>                      name regionalScope temporalScope nationwide #> 1             DE, Neujahr      Regional       FullDay       TRUE #> 2 DE, Heilige Drei Könige      Regional       FullDay      FALSE #>                      subdivisions #> 1                            NULL #> 2 DE-ST, DE-BW, DE-BY, ST, BW, BY

what: Get list of countries supported by OpenHolidays — oh_countries

Get list of countries supported by OpenHolidays — oh_countries

what: Get public holidays for a given country and time period — oh_public_holidays
title: Get public holidays for a given country and time period — oh_public_holidays
text: Get public holidays given country time period

title: Get public holidays for a given country and time period — oh_public_holidays
Get public holidays for a given country and time period — oh_public_holidays
text: country Country ISO code (e.g. "DE" Germany). language Language ISO code (default: "EN"). start_date Start date time period (YYYY-MM-DD). end_date End date time period (YYYY-MM-DD).

title: Get public holidays for a given country and time period — oh_public_holidays
text: data frame holidays given country time period.

title: Get public holidays for a given country and time period — oh_public_holidays
code: # Get all holidays for Germany for the year 2025  oh_public_holidays(country = "DE",                    language = "EN",                    start_date = "2025-01-01",                    end_date = "2025-12-31") #>                                      id  startDate    endDate   type #> 1  27f0d8cd-76b2-47e7-89ac-a3a9f6a6b1ba 2025-01-01 2025-01-01 Public #> 2 what: Get public holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_public_holidays_by_date
title: Get public holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_public_holidays_by_date
text: Get public holidays specific date countries

title: Get public holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_public_holidays_by_date
Get public holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_public_holidays_by_date
text: date date (YYYY-MM-DD). language Language ISO code (default: "EN").

title: Get public holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_public_holidays_by_date
text: data frame holidays countries.

title: Get public holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_public_holidays_by_date
code: oh_public_holiday_by_date(date = "2025-12-25") #> Error in oh_public_holiday_by_date(date = "2025-12-25"): could not find function "oh_public_holiday_by_date"

what: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays
title: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays
text: function retrieves school holidays OpenHolidays API specified country within given date range.

title: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays
code: oh_school_holidays(   country,   language = "EN",   start_date,   end_date,   subdivision = NULL )

title: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays
text: country Country ISO code (e.g., "DE"). language Language code (default: "EN"). start_date Start date YYYY-MM-DD format. end_date End date YYYY-MM-DD format. subdivision Optional subdivision ID (want holidays specific subdivision state/province).

title: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays
text: data frame school holidays.

title: Returns statistical data about holidays for a given country — oh_school_holidays

what: Get school holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_school_holidays_by_date
title: Get school holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_school_holidays_by_date
text: Get school holidays specific date countries

title: Get school holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_school_holidays_by_date
Get school holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_school_holidays_by_date
text: date date (YYYY-MM-DD). language Language ISO code (default: "EN").

title: Get school holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_school_holidays_by_date
text: data frame school holidays countries.

title: Get school holidays for a specific date for all countries — oh_school_holidays_by_date

what: Reads statistical data about stored holidays — oh_stat_public_holidays
title: Reads statistical data about stored holidays — oh_stat_public_holidays
text: Reads statistical data stored holidays

title: Reads statistical data about stored holidays — oh_stat_public_holidays
code: oh_stat_public_holidays(country, subdivision = NULL)  oh_stat_school_holidays(country, subdivision = NULL)

title: Reads statistical data about stored holidays — oh_stat_public_holidays
text: country Country ISO code (e.g., "DE"). subdivision Optional subdivision ID (want holidays specific state/province).

title: Reads statistical data about stored holidays — oh_stat_public_holidays
text: data frame containing youngestStartDate oldestStartDate.

title: Reads statistical data about stored holidays — oh_stat_public_holidays
code: # Statistical data about public holidays in Germany oh_stat_public_holidays(country = "DE") #>   youngestStartDate oldestStartDate #> 1        2030-12-26      2020-01-01  # Statistical data about school holidays in Hamburg oh_stat_school_holidays(country = "DE", subdivsion = "DE-HH") #> Error in oh_stat_school_holidays(country = "DE", subdivsion = "DE-HH"): unused argument (subdivsion = "DE-HH")

what: Get subdivisions for a given country — oh_subdivisions
title: Get subdivisions for a given country — oh_subdivisions
text: function retrieves administrative subdivisions (e.g., states, provinces) specified country OpenHolidays API.

title: Get subdivisions for a given country — oh_subdivisions
Get subdivisions for a given country — oh_subdivisions
